author: Anthony
text: Shoes advertised as new and inspected showed up to my door with a solid outer box but iffy shoes. Multiple unadvertised defects in both left and right shoes, so much so that I felt embarrassed rather than proud to have them on my feet. rEFunD!
title: Bait and Switch

author: Tessa
text: fast shipping everything was good besides the sneakers were a little dirty had some marks and proof of wear on bottoms and I had purchased my sneakers brand new!
title: fast shipping everything was good…

author: Jay
text: Take pretty long time to get my item..
title: Take pretty long time to get my item..

author: ANA ORTIZ
text: Fake positive reviews and sued by nike for fraud .: This is not the first time it happens. So within  last 24 hours suddenly 200 positive reviews. Each 20 of those  wrotten at the exact time the same day. Thats a total scam. They always  do that everytime they get bad reviews. And all those reviews always look alike . This is not the first time it happens.make sure you click the bad reviews button instead of the general reviews. They were sued by nike for fraud. You can google it.  This is a company with so many issues and no phone number . Is a hit  or miss when you order with them. Again dont believe their reviews , if you  didnt receive the item your order, or wrong item sent or you are not happy it will be a total headache as there is no phone number . Save your time
title: Fake positive reviews and sued by nike…

author: Stan
text: My entire purchase experience took 3 tines to complete. The first and second were cancelled due to non-fulfillment. Eventhough StockX is just a moderator, best to conduct a background check on the seller before allowing seller to post her/his product.
title: Stussy x PSG

author: Fraqncis
text: order was cancelled
title: order was cancelled

author: Easton
text: My product was ripped and falling apart Definitely not satisfied
title: My product was ripped and falling apart…

author: Star
text: Didn’t receive my order
title: Didn’t receive my order

author: phillip hoang
text: I ordered a jordan 4 shoe with fish skin it cost 230 dollars it came after 17 days it was ripped open and wacked and my shoe stink like fish
title: I ordered a jordan 4 shoe with fish…

author: Dylan
text: I was told it would be delivered in 7 days and it still hasn’t arrived after 23 days!
title: Really Poor

author: Tsz Kong Wong
text: I ordered a pair of shoes, I didn’t get any further update for the status. And I have been waiting for so long for the shoes arrival. It is totally unacceptable as a global online platform.
title: Complaint

author: Maqari
text: I’ve been waiting days and now almost weeks for my order to ship it’s been on authentic check for DAYS it should’ve been shipped or I should’ve had it by now
title: I’ve been waiting days and weeks

author: Darryl
text: Payment was suppose to be in 4 installments but they took the full payment all at once. Already has been over 2 weeks and still haven't received product. Will not be using this service again.
title: Payment was suppose to be in 4…

author: Jose
text:
The reason for two stars is the shipping box wasn’t well protected and was loose causing damage to the items inside and was very disappointed because one of the most expensive items was the one that got damage 

Probably won’t buy from StockX again
title: Very disappointed

author: Seven Dozier
text: My order took a long time to ship making it unavailable for the event I purchased for. Communication is horrible and policy is apparently ignored. After two working days you are supposed to be reimbursed.I wasn't and was forced to wait not being able to cancel after the deadline wasn't met to ship
title: My order took a long time to ship…

author: Michael
text: I mistakenly bought the wrong size of shoe, tried to contact stockx via email, twitter and via a well hidden form on their website. Eventually i got someone to help me and i explained i would like to cancel this bid (this is perfectly possible as EU resident). The person asked some more details and said they would cancel the order but it arrived anyway. Now i am stuck once again trying to get a hold of someone which seems nearly impossible. Really bad customer service
title: Customer service

author: Cora
text: I think we should be able to send back the product if is not the side we needed or it is not up to our standards. eBay and Amazon both allow you to send your items back however, your site definitely has higher fees .
title: I think we should be able to send back…

author: Sterling
text: My account was cancelled and I have no idea why. Silly of stockx but GOAT still got my back.
title: Account Closed for no reason

author: Emmanuel
text:
There's a delay on my order.

Nothing else but, hey there's a delay you'll have to wait. While I'm delayed with a birthday present for my significant other. It's just not cool, set your expectations right from the get go.
title: There's a delay on my order.

author: Micheal
text:
Bought a disc edition playstation 5. I received a digital. They didn't verify anything. How do you return something like this.
*reply* thank you for the generic letter.
title: Bought a disc edition playstation 5
